name: 37th Asia-Pacific Association of Cataract & Refractive Surgeons (APACRS) Annual Meeting 2025
content: The 37th Asia-Pacific Association of Cataract and Refractive Surgeons (APACRS) annual meeting, organized by the APACRS, will be held from 21 - 23 August 2025, at the Mahatma Mandir Convention and Exhibition Centre (MMCEC) in Ahmedabad, India. This meeting offers a unique platform to interact with cataract and refractive surgeons from the Asia-Pacific region and beyond, keeping them informed about the latest ophthalmic advancements and industry trends.
organizers: Asia-Pacific Association of Cataract & Refractive Surgeons (APACRS)
